summary_md: Andorra, a small principality, has a per capita GDP (41,035 USD per person) and a life expectancy (84.04 years) indicative of its developed economy and high standard of living. With a significant portion of its population connected to the internet (95.40%), it offers a conducive environment for digital nomads and expatriates. The country's health environment is also favorable, contributing to its overall quality of life.

sections.economy_md: Andorra's economy is characterized by a high per capita GDP (41,035 USD per person), reflecting its developed status and the prosperity of its residents.
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Andorra is supported by a high life expectancy (84.04 years), suggesting a healthy workforce and a stable demographic structure.
sections.digital_md: A considerable percentage of Andorra's population is internet-connected (95.40%), indicating a strong digital infrastructure that supports remote work and connectivity.
sections.health_env_md: The favorable health environment in Andorra, as suggested by its life expectancy (84.04 years), contributes to the well-being of its citizens and the attractiveness of the country for expatriates.

job_seeker: High per capita GDP (41,035 USD per person) indicating potential job opportunities in a developed economy.
High life expectancy (84.04 years) suggesting a stable and healthy workforce.
entrepreneur: Strong digital infrastructure (95.40%), providing opportunities for tech-based businesses and startups.

digital_nomad: Significant internet connectivity (95.40%), facilitating remote work and digital nomad lifestyle.
High quality of life and stable demographic structure (84.04 years) making it an attractive destination for digital nomads.
expat_family: High per capita GDP (41,035 USD per person) ensuring a comfortable standard of living for expat families.
Favorable health environment (84.04 years) contributing to the well-being of expat families and children.
